label: Editor
title: Basic Interaction
steps: Add Node: Click the 'Add Node' button, then click anywhere on the canvas.
Add Edge: Click 'Add Edge', then drag from one node to another.
Move: In 'Move' mode (default), drag nodes to reposition them.
Edit/Delete: Click on a node or edge to open the property panel.

label: Layout
title: Graph Organization
steps: Compact: Arranges nodes to minimize empty space in diamond style.
Layered: Useful for hierarchical or directed graphs.
Circle: Places all nodes in a perfectly circular formation.
Grid: Snaps nodes to a structured grid layout.

label: Algorithm
title: Running Algorithms
steps: Select an algorithm from the Algorithms menu.
Follow the instructions in the bottom popup (e.g., 'Select a SOURCE node').
Use the Player Bar at the bottom to step through the execution.
Click the Stop button to return to editor mode.

label: Save
title: Exporting Data
steps: As Text: Opens a modal with the graph data ready to be copied.
As JSON: Downloads a file with all nodes, positions, and edges.

label: Load
title: Importing Graphs
steps: From Text: Paste a node and/or an edge list (e.g., A B 10) for quick import.
From JSON: Upload a previously saved .json file.
Test Graph: You can load an example graph using the From Text panel.
